message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, but I'm open to discussing if you have a different price in mind.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.

Bob, thanks for your interest.  I understand your budget constraints, but $6,000 is too low for me to consider.  This product is worth a lot more based on its features and market value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000?

I appreciate your flexibility, but $10,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. I'm willing to make a fair deal, but I really need to stay within my budget.
